description:
Changes :D
- Updated main riff throughout song on all tracks
- Cleaned up notation
- Removed extra measure after Chorus 1
- Updated section names
- Updated lots of lead guitar stuff, probably needs more
title: From The Pinnacle To The Pit

description:
Took solo from 70% to 90% accurate. It's one of those improv tapping ones so just get in the ballpark and do your own thing imo.

Updated trills, staccato, slides and P.M.s here and there
title: From The Pinnacle To The Pit

description: I realised that last time I did nothing to improve the drums. They should be better now. I also boosted the organ a little bit.
